SS: I am new to this world, I was once a blank
protoform, but I know I can turn bots into my dark
transmetal slaves if they are willing to serve me for
a taste of power. I can fly in black dragon mode. I
have a boa in addition to my regular weapons that
allows for capturing the enemy unharmed althought
that's not my preference (evil grin).

OOC: Shivah's a girls right. If not disregard this
next part.

BIC: SS: Oh and I'm also a doctor (he lies).

He reaches forward and rubs her breast as if examining
her (does she look anything like the Shivah you summon
in FF7).

> 
> Shivah::
>
